mapper.select: SELECT e.edcts_cd, e.prdt_nm, e.spec, e.unit, e.saf_stc FROM edcts e, bom b WHERE e.edcts_cd = b.edcts_cd ORDER BY e.edcts_cd
SELECT e.edcts_cd, e.prdt_nm, e.spec, e.unit, e.saf_stc FROM edcts e LEFT OUTER JOIN bom b ON e.edcts_cd = b.edcts_cd WHERE b.bom_cd IS NULL ORDER BY e.edcts_cd
